original:
Bio-based polymers are derived from renewable biological resources and are utilized in the production of various plastic materials. However, it is important to note that not all bio-based polymers are compostable or biodegradable. While many natural biopolymers can be biodegraded in natural environments, only a limited number of bio-based plastics made from bio-based monomers possess this capability.
